subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Better Talk Now has a shot at becoming the first 10-year-old horse to win a Grade I race in Saturday’s $500,000 Sword Dancer Invitational at Saratoga.
snippet: Better Talk Now has a shot at becoming the first 10-year-old horse to win a Grade I race in Saturday’s $500,000 Sword Dancer Invitational at Saratoga.
